meanings.definition: A bridge or structure carrying a road or railway over a river, road, or other obstacle.
meanings.sent1: The overpasses in the city help cars cross busy roads safely.
meanings.sent2: The highway had many overpasses to allow traffic to flow smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The overpasses in the town were so high that birds built nests underneath.
meanings.sent4: The overpasses stood tall like giants striding over the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The overpasses loomed above, casting shadows on the streets below.

meanings.definition: To pass over or across (a bridge or obstacle).
meanings.sent1: The train overpasses the river on its journey to the next town.
meanings.sent2: She carefully overpasses the narrow bridge to reach the other side.
meanings.sent3: The cat overpasses the puddle by jumping from one stone to another.
meanings.sent4: His voice overpasses the noise of the crowd, reaching every corner of the room.
meanings.sent5: The athlete overpasses his previous record, setting a new personal best.
